original_title: Dienstbereit - Nazis und Faschisten im Auftrag der CIA
overview: Florian Hartung and Dirk Pohlmann have reconstructed a previously unknown dimension of the collaboration between Nazis and the CIA in the Cold War. Drawing upon recently released documents, the film exposes for the first time a perfidious, worldwide net that reaches deep into the power structures of the Federal Republic of Germany. Lending their authority to the fact-findersâ€™ mission are high-ranking statesmen, journalists and historians.
title: Nazis in the CIA
